idea-plugin.name: Bug Finder
idea-plugin.description: A static code analysis tool for locating and fixing complicated, semantic, and (as far as possible) buggy patterns in your Python code. We use graphs-based patterns, which were gathered from 120 GitHub repositories by code-change-miner tool. Behind the scenes, the plugin runs an inspection which builds isomorphic mappings between fine-grained Program Dependence Graphs of mined patterns and a similar graph of your code, and then suggests you a relevant quick-fix to repair the highlighted code fragment.
